entry.title: Current Conditions: -18.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 06:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Temperature: -18.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -20.8°C
Wind: S 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light late this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
